name: Just Another Platformer (Lpjton)
description:
Just Another Platformer is just another Platformer...

Or it would be if the game hadn't decided to take over control and doing things which nobody anticipates - not even the game developer.

But he will try his best to lead you through this adventure, while the game changes the keys to move right, left or to jump as the mood takes it.

Play the game with sound turned on! Otherwise you will be completely lost.
